wrath.common.entities

Class EntityDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.common.entities.EntityDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EntityDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to read Entity Data from the 'assets/entities' directory.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor.

      Gets the default value of the entity's scale size compared to the unmodified model.

      Gets the String file-path of the Jar file containing the Entity class.

      Gets the String name of the Entity's model.

      Gets the amount, in floating point number, the Entity is susceptible to having specular light reflect off of it.

      Gets the distance at which the renderer's camera can no longer see reflected light.

      Gets the String name of the Entity's texture.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityDescriptor

        public EntityDescriptor(java.lang.String modelName,
                        java.lang.String textureName,
                        java.lang.String jarPath,
                        float defScale,
                        float reflectivity,
                        float shineDampening)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The String name of the Entity's model.
        textureName - the String name of the Entity's texture.
        jarPath - The String file-path of the Jar file containing the Entity's class. This is to ensure that clients joining a server containing this Entity has the correct code for it to work. This can be null.
        defScale - The default value of the entity's scale size compared to the unmodified model.
        reflectivity - The amount, in floating point number, the Entity is susceptible to having specular light reflect off of it. Default 0.
        shineDampening - The distance at which the renderer's camera can no longer see reflected light. Default 1.

      • loadEntityDescriptor

        public static EntityDescriptor loadEntityDescriptor(java.io.File entityDescFile)
        Loads an EntityDescriptor from a file.
        Parameters:
        entityDescFile - The File that contains the Entity's data.
        Returns:
        Returns an EntityDescriptor based off of the File's data.
